name: monkeyset
description: A lightweight and performance based OHLCV data manager

scripts.docs: jsdoc --destination ./docs -R README.md -r monkeyset.js && git add README.md out && git commit -m "docs update" && git push origin development
scripts.release:major: git add -A && git commit -m "Version bump" && npm version major && git tag "%npm_package_version%" && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: git add -A && git commit -m "Version bump" && npm version minor && git tag "%npm_package_version%" && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: git add -A && git commit -m "Version bump" && npm version patch && git tag "%npm_package_version%" && git push --tags && npm publish
